data.title: Individual Home Appliance Protection Plans
data.meta_description: Constellation Home's individual appliance protection plans provide peace of mind during untimely breakdowns. Learn more.
data.text:
Why is it that appliances always seem to break down at the most inconvenient times? Being prepared with a home service plan is crucial, especially for things like your HVAC system or water heater. With an average repair cost for an appliance at about $168, a single breakdown could exceed the cost of your service plan.

Constellation Home Appliance Service Plans give you peace-of-mind protection and guaranteed satisfaction for all major appliance brands. You can trust that a certified, licensed technician is just a phone call away. Your coverage means you pay nothing for labor or covered parts, even if your equipment is old. Plus, we offer 24/7 emergency service. Never again worry about an inconvenient appliance breakdown.

Appliance Service Plan Benefits

With a Constellation Home Appliance Protection Plan, youâ€™ll receive fast, professional service in the event of a breakdown. Plus, our expert repair coverage helps keep your equipment in optimum condition for longer service life. Our service plans provide repair protection with the following benefits:

No charge for covered parts

No charge for labor

Fast, reliable service

Professional, certified service technicians

Unlimited service calls

(Complete service plan benefits are detailed in the Terms and Conditions.)

Enroll in an Appliance Service Plan Today
